Sebion:
Mm-m ... I think I can tell you about it. Underground tunnel connected to the Labyrinth Bellis was the abode of Harnack, King of the Giants. Another discovery, enflame our minds! Yes, this is a very important find....
However, most of the scouts, who investigated the tunnel, were killed incomprehensible beings. And many of those who managed to come back, died in terrible agony. So we turned to the study.
